column4: I think theres something wrong with my video drivers because everything is REALLY slow like 2  fps but my mouse is fine and it wasnt like this till i restarted. any ideas?
do you have Compiz turned on?
yes and its been on for a few days but i just noticed this. i know for sure my pc can handle it
i imagine it can, but i would turn that stuff off just to see what happens
how would i do that from terminal
yes. lol i cant even boot ff3
is x working for you at all
how do i tell (im a bit new to linux)
blind leading the blind, but i do know the ubuntu option to turn things off in a cmd prompt is gnome-appearance-properties
np wish i could be of more help, does it start?
- yes, that would be my short term memory failing
still molasses huh? it should pop up
y'know that's pretty much what you'd be doing anyway
